Hey, Lynn and Amy!
   
  I've been on this board for a month but haven't posted because I felt a little out of my depth. :) I joined because I've recently become interested in EVP and thought this would be a good place to get pointers on capturing EVP on tape.   I had never heard of ITC before joining and am currently learning what it's about (I bought a book about ITC just last week and am fascinated).
   
  Anyway, I'm moving to Kerrville (my home town) in a few weeks .... so that will be another board member in your "neighborhood."
   
  So, hello!  
   
  -Lanza

  
ON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
          hey lynn btw, was looking through the members of the group and ummm HI!
i live off 410 and harry wurzbach 

just thought you might like to know that. Have to share some ghost hunting stories sometime, maybe if i get invited  
 we could check out your house.

amy


Amy Sutter 

www.myspace.com/LON3_S7AR
